com.metreeca.rest

Class Message.Body<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Message.Body<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the data structure exposed by the message body
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Result<V>
    Enclosing class:
    Message<T extends Message<T>>

    public final class Message.Body<V>
extends Object
implements Result<V>
    HTTP message body.

    Provides a type-safe interface for structured message bodies managed by formats.

    A body is associated to a message through a message body format, responsible for retrieving its structured value and configuring the message as a holder for structured values of the specific format-managed type.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public T set(V value)
        Configures the structured message body.

        Future calls to Message.body(Format) with the same format associated to this message body will return a message body holding the specified structured value, rather than the structured value retrieved by the format associated to this body.

        The message this body belongs to is configured for holding the structured value according to the format associated to this body.

        Parameters:
        value - the structured value for this body
        Returns:
        the message this body belongs to
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if value is null
        IllegalStateException - if a body value was already retrieved from the message this body belongs to using one the getter result methods on one of its bodies

      • pipe

        public T pipe(Function<V,V> mapper)
        Filters the structured value of this body.

        Future calls to getter result methods on this body will pipe the structured value either explicitly set or retrieved on demand by the format associated to this body through a filtering function.

        Parameters:
        mapper - the value filtering function
        Returns:
        the message this body belongs to
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null
        IllegalStateException - if a body value was already retrieved from the message this body belongs to using one the getter result methods on one of its bodies

      • flatPipe

        public T flatPipe(Function<V,Result<V>> mapper)
        Filters the structured value of this body.

        Future calls to getter result methods on this body will pipe the structured value either explicitly set or retrieved on demand by the format associated to this body through a result-returning filtering function.

        Parameters:
        mapper - the value filtering function
        Returns:
        the message this body belongs to
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if mapper is null
        IllegalStateException - if a body value was already retrieved from the message this body belongs to using one the getter result methods on one of its bodies

      • map

        public <R> R map(Function<V,R> success,
                 Function<Failure<V>,R> failure)
        Maps operation results.

        Successfully retrieved structured values handled to the success mapper are cached for future reuse.

        Specified by:
        map in interface Result<V>
        Type Parameters:
        R - the type of the final operation outcome
        Parameters:
        success - a function mapping from the returned value to the final operation outcome
        failure - a function mapping from the reported failure to the final operation outcome
        Returns:
        the final operation outcome, as generated by either success or failure according to the result state
